result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
2:34 PM CO: Vlack, Reporter: Gross, Clerk: Christianson. Prosecuting attorney Brian Thomas Smestad in court for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney John P Bjork in court for Joel Dennis Hollerud. Defendant Joel Dennis Hollerud in court, in custody. Atty Bjork states speedy trial demand. Court sets JT.  MIL due by 12/6 any unusual MIL due 11/13. Adjourned 02:40 PM
Jury trial scheduled for January 3, 2023 at 08:15 am.
Jury trial scheduled for January 4, 2023 at 08:15 am.
Jury trial scheduled for January 5, 2023 at 08:15 am.
Final pre-trial scheduled for December 13, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Final pre-trial on December 13, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Jury trial on January 5, 2023 at 08:15 am.
Jury trial on January 4, 2023 at 08:15 am.
Jury trial on January 3, 2023 at 08:15 am.
Filed by ADA Ellenwood. arc
Scheduling. Signed by EFV on 10/04/22. arc

8:59 AM CO: Vlack, Reporter: Gross, Clerk: Christianson. Prosecuting attorney Erica Ellenwood in court for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney John P Bjork in court for Joel Dennis Hollerud. Defendant Joel Dennis Hollerud appeared by video, in custody. Court reviews case. Court reviews information filed. Court informs Defendant of charges, possible penalties and rights. Defendant understands. NG on all counts. Speedy trial demand. Court orders discovery to be provided as soon as possible. Court sets STC. Adjourned 11:29 AM
Status conference scheduled for October 18, 2022 at 02:15 pm.
Status conference on October 18, 2022 at 02:15 pm.
20 counts. arc

03:14 PM CO: Vlack, Reporter: Gross, Clerk: Christianson. Prosecuting attorney Erica Ellenwood in court for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney John P Bjork in court for Joel Dennis Hollerud. Defendant Joel Dennis Hollerud in court, in custody. Court reviews case. S/ T Detective K. Knepler. Direct by Atty Ellenwood. Court will not record to reflect the identification of the DE for purposes of today only. Cross by Atty Bjork. Redirect by ADA Ellenwood. Recross by Atty Bjork. S/T Carol Anderson. Direct by Atty Bjork. Witness dismissed. Atty arguments. Court finds probable cause that a felony was committed and the DF probably committed that felony and binds over for trial.  Bail Bond Hearing: S/T Carol Anderson. Direct by Atty Bjork. Cross by ADA Ellenwood. Witness excused. Atty arguments. Court denies bond modification. Court sets ARGN.  Adjourned 04:13 PM
Arraignment scheduled for October 4, 2022 at 11:15 am.
Arraignment on October 4, 2022 at 11:15 am.

10:30  AM CO: Vlack, DAR: Gross, Clerk: K Kittel. Defendant Joel Dennis Hollerud in court.  Attorney John P Bjork in court for with Defendant Joel Dennis Hollerud, in person, in custody. V/W present. Attys have seen Dr. Minter's report. State does not have further evidence. Atty Bjork states DE agrees with the findings of the report. Court finds both State and Defense have waived the right to present further evidence. Court questions DE as to competency who states he is competent. Court finds Defendant to be competent. Court addresses Atty Bjork's Motion to Modify Bond. Attys argue bond modification. Court sets PH. State may reschedule if officer not avail Monday.  Adjourned: 10:45 am
Preliminary hearing scheduled for September 26, 2022 at 03:15 pm.
Preliminary hearing on September 26, 2022 at 03:15 pm.
Defendant's Motion to Modify Bond/Bail. Filed by Atty Bjork.  gll   to rg 9/23
Filed by WI Forensic Unit DR. Minter.arc    to rg
signed by EFV on 08/24/22. arc   emailed DHS and Vicki.

1:08 PM CO: Vlack, Reporter: Gross, Clerk: Lindabaur. Prosecuting attorney Aaron Damrau in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Joel Dennis Hollerud in court, in custody.  Attorney John P Bjork in court for Joel Dennis Hollerud. Atty Bjork states he raised competency previously before the Court Commissioner, but was advised the issue needed to be brought before the judge. Court reviews statute. Court makes findings and orders competency examination. Court sets Competency Hearing.  gll
Competency hearing scheduled for September 23, 2022 at 10:30 am.
Competency hearing on September 23, 2022 at 10:30 am.
Status conference on August 24, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

11:03 AM Crt Comm: Timothy C. Heckmann, RPR: Unmonitored DAR, Clk: Yates. Attorney John P Bjork in court for Joel Dennis Hollerud.  Attorney Erica Ellenwood in court for State of Wisconsin. Defendant Joel Dennis Hollerud in court, in custody. Court notes competency motion. Atty Bjork requests PH be continued pending competency. Atty Ellenwood objects. Court orders PH continued pending motion. Attorneys to schedule with JA. Adjourned: 11:06 a.m.
Review scheduled for August 26, 2022 at 07:45 am.
for Competency examination filed by Atty Bjork. sf     to rg

- No contact with any minor under the age of 18.

- It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, H.J.B., A.L.B., L.K.F., K.C.J., or S.J.W. or their residences.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, social media including but not limited to texting, Facebook, Twitter, contact through the mail, and/or through a third person.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

- If the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bail jumping. I understand that I must report to and comply with all terms, conditions, and protocols of the St. Croix County Justice Support Center. I further understand that I am required to be fitted with a GPS monitoring device. Failure to report and/or comply with conditions and/or protocols may result in a report to the District Attorney's Office, an arrest warrant, and/or referral for criminal charges.

I understand that I must IMMEDIATELY report to the Justice Support Center located adjacent to the lower parking lot of the St. Croix County Government Center. 

If after regular business hours I must call (715)245-4109 to schedule an appointment with the Justice Support Center by the end of the following business day.

1:11 PM CO: Vlack, Reporter: Gross, Clerk: Christianson. Prosecuting attorney Bela Alexander Ballo in court for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney John P Bjork in court for Joel Dennis Hollerud. Defendant Joel Dennis Hollerud in court, in custody. Court reviews case. ADA Ballo makes bond argument. Atty Bjork states DE maybe in a mental health crisis and questions competency. Atty Bjork states DE could get into a VA inpatient mental health program. Atty Bjork makes bond argument. Atty Bjork will not be raising competency at this time but will make further decision before PH. Court Amends bond. Court will consider co-signature bond. Adjourned 01:22 PM
from JA to DE and Atty. Bjork appointing counsel. kma
